from openpyxl import load_workbook

def excel_range_to_html(filepath, sheet_name, cell_range):
    wb = load_workbook(filepath)
    ws = wb[sheet_name]
  
    # è·å–èŒƒå›´æ•°æ® ğŸ¯
    rows = []
    for row in ws[cell_range]:
        row_data = []
        for cell in row:
            row_data.append(str(cell.value) if cell.value is not None else "")
        rows.append(row_data)
  
    # ç”ŸæˆHTMLè¡¨æ ¼ ğŸ—ï¸
    html_table = "<table border='1'>\n"
    for row in rows:
        html_table += "  <tr>\n"
        for value in row:
            html_table += f"    <td>{value}</td>\n"
        html_table += "  </tr>\n"
    html_table += "</table>"
  
    return html_table

# ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼šè½¬æ¢Sheet1çš„A1åˆ°C5èŒƒå›´
html_output = excel_range_to_html('data.xlsx', 'Sheet1', 'A1:C5')
with open('table_part.html', 'w') as f:
    f.write(html_output)

import win32com.client

def excel_to_html_vba(input_path, output_path, sheet_name):
    excel = win32com.client.Dispatch("Excel.Application")
    workbook = excel.Workbooks.Open(input_path)
    sheet = workbook.Sheets(sheet_name)
  
    # ä½¿ç”¨VBAçš„SaveAsæ–¹æ³•
    sheet.SaveAs(output_path, 44)  # 44æ˜¯HTMLæ ¼å¼
  
    workbook.Close(False)
    excel.Quit()

# ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹
excel_to_html_vba('data.xlsx', 'output_vba.html', 'Sheet1')

def create_custom_window():
    win = tk.Toplevel(root)
    win.geometry("300x200")
  
    # æ ‡é¢˜
    title = tk.Label(win, text="è‡ªå®šä¹‰çª—å£", font=("Arial", 14, "bold"))
    title.place(relx=0.5, rely=0.1, anchor="center")
  
    # å†…å®¹
    content = tk.Label(win, text="è¿™æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨placeå¸ƒå±€çš„è‡ªå®šä¹‰çª—å£", wraplength=250)
    content.place(relx=0.5, rely=0.4, anchor="center")
  
    # å…³é—­æŒ‰é’®
    close_btn = tk.Button(win, text="å…³é—­", command=win.destroy)
    close_btn.place(relx=0.5, rely=0.8, anchor="center", width=80, height=30)
  
    # è£…é¥°å…ƒç´ 
    decor1 = tk.Label(win, bg="gold", width=5, height=1)
    decor1.place(x=0, y=0)
    decor2 = tk.Label(win, bg="gold", width=5, height=1)
    decor2.place(relx=1.0, rely=1.0, anchor="se")

# ä¸»çª—å£æŒ‰é’®
main_btn = tk.Button(root, text="åˆ›å»ºçª—å£", command=create_custom_window)
main_btn.place(relx=0.5, rely=0.7, anchor="center")

root.mainloop()

    root.grid_columnconfigure(i, weight=1)

    from datetime import timedelta

def add_business_days(start_date, business_days):
    current = start_date
    added_days = 0
    while added_days < business_days:
        current += timedelta(days=1)
        if current.weekday() < 5:  # 0-4æ˜¯å‘¨ä¸€åˆ°å‘¨äº”
            added_days += 1
    return current

import smtplib
from email.mime.multipart import MIMEMultipart
from email.mime.text import MIMEText

def send_email(to_addr):
    # åˆ›å»ºæ¶ˆæ¯å¯¹è±¡
    msg = MIMEMultipart()
    msg['From'] = 'me@example.com'
    msg['To'] = to_addr
    msg['Subject'] = 'Pythoné‚®ä»¶æµ‹è¯•'

    # é‚®ä»¶æ­£æ–‡
    body = """
    <h1>ä½ å¥½å‘€ï¼</h1>
    <p>è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€å°æ¥è‡ªPythonçš„æµ‹è¯•é‚®ä»¶~</p>
    <p>å‘é€æ—¶é—´ï¼š2023-05-20</p>
    """
    msg.attach(MIMEText(body, 'html', 'utf-8'))

    # å‘é€é‚®ä»¶
    try:
        server = smtplib.SMTP_SSL('smtp.example.com', 465)
        server.login('me@example.com', 'password')
        server.send_message(msg)
        server.quit()
        return True
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"å‘é€å¤±è´¥ ğŸ˜¢: {e}")
        return False

# è°ƒç”¨å‡½æ•°
if send_email('friend@example.com'):

def get_email_body(msg):
    """é€’å½’è·å–é‚®ä»¶æ­£æ–‡å†…å®¹"""
    if msg.is_multipart():
        for part in msg.walk():
            content_type = part.get_content_type()
            content_disposition = str(part.get("Content-Disposition"))
          
            # é™„ä»¶è·³è¿‡ (ï½€ãƒ»Ï‰ãƒ»Â´)
            if "attachment" in content_disposition:
                continue
              
            # é€’å½’å¤„ç†å¤šéƒ¨åˆ†é‚®ä»¶
            body = get_email_body(part)
            if body:
                return body
    else:
        content_type = msg.get_content_type()
        if content_type == "text/plain" or content_type == "text/html":
            # è·å–é‚®ä»¶å†…å®¹å¹¶è§£ç  (ï¾‰â—•ãƒ®â—•)ï¾‰*:ï½¥ï¾Ÿâœ§
            content = msg.get_payload(decode=True)
            charset = msg.get_content_charset() or "utf-8"
            return content.decode(charset)
    return None

# è·å–é‚®ä»¶æ­£æ–‡
body = get_email_body(msg)
if body:
    print("é‚®ä»¶æ­£æ–‡:")
    print(body[:500] + "...")  # åªæ‰“å°å‰500ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦é¿å…å¤ªé•¿

import os

def save_attachments(msg, download_folder="attachments"):
    """ä¿å­˜é‚®ä»¶é™„ä»¶"""
    if not os.path.isdir(download_folder):
        os.makedirs(download_folder)
      
    for part in msg.walk():
        content_disposition = str(part.get("Content-Disposition"))
      
        if "attachment" in content_disposition:
            # è·å–æ–‡ä»¶å (â˜…Ï‰â˜…)
            filename = part.get_filename()
            if filename:
                filename, encoding = decode_header(filename)[0]
                if isinstance(filename, bytes):
                    filename = filename.decode(encoding if encoding else "utf-8")
              
                # ä¿å­˜é™„ä»¶ Îµ==3
                filepath = os.path.join(download_folder, filename)
                with open(filepath, "wb") as f:
                    f.write(part.get_payload(decode=True))
                print(f"é™„ä»¶å·²ä¿å­˜: {filepath}")

save_attachments(msg)

import imaplib
import email
from email.header import decode_header
import os

def read_emails(email_account, password, max_emails=5):
    # 1. è¿æ¥æœåŠ¡å™¨ Ù©(â—•â€¿â—•ï½¡)Û¶
    mail = imaplib.IMAP4_SSL("imap.qq.com")
    mail.login(email_account, password)
    mail.select("INBOX")
  
    # 2. æœç´¢æœªè¯»é‚®ä»¶ âœ§*ã€‚Ù©(ËŠÏ‰Ë‹*)Ùˆâœ§*ã€‚
    status, messages = mail.search(None, "UNSEEN")
    if status != "OK":
        print("æ²¡æœ‰æ‰¾åˆ°é‚®ä»¶")
        return
      
    email_ids = messages[0].split()
    email_ids = email_ids[-max_emails:]  # åªå¤„ç†æœ€æ–°çš„å‡ å°
  
    print(f"æ‰¾åˆ° {len(email_ids)} å°æœªè¯»é‚®ä»¶:")
  
    # 3. å¤„ç†æ¯å°é‚®ä»¶ (â—'â—¡'â—)
    for email_id in reversed(email_ids):
        status, msg_data = mail.fetch(email_id, "(RFC822)")
        if status != "OK":
            continue
          
        msg = email.message_from_bytes(msg_data[0][1])
      
        # è§£æé‚®ä»¶å¤´éƒ¨ä¿¡æ¯ (â˜…Ï‰â˜…)
        subject, encoding = decode_header(msg["Subject"])[0]
        subject = subject.decode(encoding) if isinstance(subject, bytes) else subject
        from_ = msg.get("From")
        date = msg.get("Date")
      
        print("\n" + "="*50)
        print(f"ä¸»é¢˜: {subject}")
        print(f"å‘ä»¶äºº: {from_}")
        print(f"æ—¥æœŸ: {date}")
      
        # è·å–é‚®ä»¶æ­£æ–‡ (ï¾‰â—•ãƒ®â—•)ï¾‰*:ï½¥ï¾Ÿâœ§
        body = get_email_body(msg)
        if body:
            print("\né‚®ä»¶å†…å®¹:")
            print(body[:500] + ("..." if len(body) > 500 else ""))
      
        # ä¿å­˜é™„ä»¶ Îµ==3
        save_attachments(msg)
  
    # 4. å…³é—­è¿æ¥ (ï½¡â€¢Ì€á´—-)âœ§
    mail.close()
    mail.logout()

# ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹ (ãƒâ—•ãƒ®â—•)ãƒ*:ãƒ»ã‚šâœ§
read_emails("your_email@qq.com", "your_app_password")
